name: Robo-ducklings vs The Buttons
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world where only darkness, white blocks, and evil buttons exist you must incarnate the Robo-ducklings: an insanely cohesive gang of good-willed fellas with a bad attitude that are always seeking to destroy the evil buttons.

CONTROLS

Move with WASD

OBJECTIVE

Step on all the buttons of the same color simultaneously to activate the Robo-ducklings. Then, after all ducklings have been activated, step on the green buttons at the same time to beat the level.

CREDITS

Made by Lascario Pacheco

Fonts:

  • KARMATIC ARCADE
  • TERREMOTO
  • KG HAPPY

Yeah, I know it's a development build but the graphics looked off in the Production Build.
